quote.registrar: Computershare Hong Kong Investor Services Ltd.
quote.issuer_name: Hao Tian International Construction Investment Group Ltd.
quote.nm: Hao Tian International Construction Investment Group Ltd.
quote.summary: Hao Tian International Construction Investment Group Ltd is an investment holding company mainly engaged in construction machinery leasing business. The Company operates through five business segments. The Rental and Sale of Construction Machinery and Spare Part segment is engaged in the rental of construction machinery such as crawler cranes, as well as the sales of construction machinery and spare parts. The Provision of Asset Management, Securities Brokerage and Other Financial Service segment provides asset management, securities brokerage and other financial services. The Provision of Repair and Maintenance and Transportation Service segment provides repair and maintenance services for construction machinery, as well as transportation services such as local container transportation. The Money Lending segment provides mortgage loans and personal loan business. The Property Development segment is engaged in the development of residential, industrial and commercial properties.
